plt.ylabel('gpa')

plt.scatter(new_data['SAT'],y)
yhat_no=0.6439+0.0014*data['SAT']
yhat_yes=0.8665+0.0014*data['SAT']
fig=plt.plot(new_data['SAT'],yhat_no,c='Red')
fig=plt.plot(new_data['SAT'],yhat_yes,c='Blue')
plt.xlabel('SAT')
plt.ylabel('GPA')
plt.show()
